name: Soulbound
flavor: You fire a piercing bolt of psychic energy that lances through two foes and leaves a faint intangible thread between them.

metadata.flavor: You fire a piercing bolt of psychic energy that lances through two foes and leaves a faint intangible thread between them.

effects.tier1: 8 damage; A < WEAK, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)
effects.tier2: 13 damage; A < AVERAGE, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)
effects.tier3: 17 damage; A < STRONG, the target is stitched to the other target (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If any target becomes stitched to the other, both targets are stitched together. While stitched together, a target takes a bane on power rolls while not adjacent to a creature they're stitched to. Whenever a stitched target takes damage that wasn't dealt by or also taken by another stitched target, each other stitched target takes half the damage the initial target took.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You target yourself and three enemies instead.
